group.name: map-iphone-ipod-touch
group.expr: ( device.isA('Apple-iPhone') or device.isA('Apple-iPod-Touch') ) and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS [012]_.*' and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS 3_0.*'

group.name: map-apple
group.expr: ( (device.isA('Apple-iPhone') or device.isA('Apple-iPod-Touch')) and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS [012]_.*' and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS 3_0.*') or device.isA('Apple-iPhone-OS-4.0') or device.isA('Apple-iPad')

group.name: map-android
group.expr: device.isA('SonyEricsson-X10') or device.isA('SE-X10-mini') or device.isA('HTC-Desire') or device.isA('HTC-A8183') or device.isA('Android-Emulator')

group.name: map-apple-android
group.expr: ( device.isA('SonyEricsson-X10') or device.isA('SE-X10-mini') or device.isA('HTC-Desire') or device.isA('HTC-A8183') or device.isA('Android-Emulator') ) or ( ( (device.isA('Apple-iPhone') or device.isA('Apple-iPod-Touch')) and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS [012]_.*' and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS 3_0.*' ) or device.isA('Apple-iPhone-OS-4.0') or device.isA('Apple-iPad') )

group.name: map-advanced
group.expr: device.isA('SonyEricsson-X10') or device.isA('SE-X10-mini') or device.isA('HTC-Desire') or device.isA('HTC-A8183') or device.isA('Android-Emulator') or ( (device.isA('Apple-iPhone') or device.isA('Apple-iPod-Touch') ) and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS [012]_.*' and device.userAgent !~ '.*OS 3_0.*') or device.isA('Apple-iPhone-OS-4.0') or device.isA('Apple-iPad') or device.isA('SAGEM-HomeManager') or (device.isA('PC') and !device.isA('PC-Win32-IE') and !device.isA('PC-MacOS-IE'))

group.name: map-intermediate
group.expr: device.isA('Nokia-6120c') or device.isA('Nokia-6720c') or device.isA('Nokia-E51') or device.isA('Nokia-E71') or device.isA('Nokia-N85') or device.isA('Nokia-N95') or device.isA('Nokia-N96') or ( ( device.isA('Apple-iPhone') or device.isA('Apple-iPod-Touch') ) and device.userAgent =~ '.*OS 3_0.*' )
